target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and startup founders looking to name their companies
pain_points: names that don't pass telephone test
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Multiple examples of million-dollar businesses built on good naming (Boss Babe: 5+ million dollar year business, 6.6 million followers)

problems_validated.problem: Startup names are more important than ever for being scroll-stopping in social media
problems_validated.severity: High - can make or break business success
problems_validated.market_gap: Lack of systematic approach to naming that considers modern digital landscape

products_tools.name: Empire.co
products_tools.use_case: Business education and frameworks including naming strategies

products_tools.name: Glimpse
products_tools.use_case: Enhanced Google Trends analysis with additional information and related terms

products_tools.name: Google Trends
products_tools.use_case: Tracking phrase popularity over time for naming decisions

business_strategies.strategy: Grab trending phrase handles early and build businesses around them
business_strategies.implementation: Monitor Google Trends for emerging phrases, secure social handles, create content around the phrase
business_strategies.expected_results: Millions of followers and multi-million dollar businesses
business_strategies.case_study: Boss Babe - grabbed handle in 2013, grew to 6.6M followers, 5+ million dollar yearly business

business_strategies.strategy: Use humor in naming for viral potential
business_strategies.implementation: Create funny, memorable names that make people laugh and share
business_strategies.expected_results: Free viral traffic and media coverage
business_strategies.case_study: You Probably Need a Haircut - launched in 24 hours during COVID, got millions of visits and Good Morning America coverage

problems_solutions.problem: Creating effective startup names that work in digital age
problems_solutions.solution: Use three-part framework: Descriptive names, Phrases, or Funny names
steps: Test if name passes telephone test

startup_ideas.idea: You Probably Need a Haircut - connecting barbers to people for DIY haircut coaching
startup_ideas.target_market: People stuck at home during COVID needing haircuts
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Inability to get professional haircuts during lockdown
startup_ideas.business_model: Connecting service between barbers and customers
startup_ideas.validation: Launched in 24 hours, got millions of visits and major media coverage

startup_ideas.idea: You Probably Need a Robot - AI automation business
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Manual processes that could be automated
startup_ideas.validation: Getting free traffic using same humor approach

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Choosing names that fail the telephone test
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Customers can't find your app when searching, misspell the name
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Test if people can spell and find your name when told verbally
mistakes_to_avoid.example: WhatsApp - people spell it as 'What's at' when searching

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Using negative words in business names
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Creates negative associations with your brand
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Avoid words like 'stop' - use positive action words instead
mistakes_to_avoid.example: GameStop - should be 'GameStart' since you want people to play games, not stop them

growth_tactics.tactic: Use humor in naming and content for viral spread
growth_tactics.results_expected: Free viral traffic, media coverage, millions of website visits

growth_tactics.tactic: Own a phrase to dominate search results
growth_tactics.results_expected: Top search rankings ahead of established competitors

metrics_kpis.benchmark: People can spell and find your name when told verbally

trends_signals.trend: Startup names need to be scroll-stopping for social media success
trends_signals.opportunity: Businesses that master social-first naming will have competitive advantage

trends_signals.trend: Phrase ownership becoming valuable digital real estate
trends_signals.opportunity: Early identification and claiming of trending phrases can build million-dollar businesses

actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize naming as critical business decision

actionable_quotes.context: Explaining why names matter more in social media age
actionable_quotes.actionability: Test names for social media memorability and shareability
